review: I consulted the doctor as I had issues related to swelling in the right palm. He didn't give too much medicines. He suggested some tablets, I took for 7 to 21 days . I took blood tests. I was able to see improvements in treatment. Waiting time was for 2 hours there are chambers, other doctor scheduled. We were not aware of timing. The doctor is very good. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. I am satisfied with the treatment given.

I met the doctor for my son as he had swelling in leg. *** ********* *** ***** But in reception behavior was not good in counter. *** ****** *** ***** Medicines and scanning was prescribed. Waiting time was for 2 hours. I am satisfied with the treatment given. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends . My child is fine now.

** ** * **** ****** *** satisfied with treatment. I would like to recommend this doctor to others. When it comes to improvement, staff and maintenance was good and I would like to give a rating of 4/5.
An expert surgeon, a good person and overall a patient caring doctor. I will suggest him to all looking for an orthopedic sugeon. He has given my 70yrs old mother a new  life after TKR surgery

I GOT MY HEMI-REPLACEMENT ORTHROPLASTY SURGERY BY DR. BISHAL BHAGAT AND I AM VERY HAPPY WITH THE TREATMENT OF BISHAL JI AND HIS BEHAVIOR IS SO GOOD.

*** ****** ****** ** * **** **** *******
Proficient & Good Natured doctor. Executed A surgery on my aged mother. He was able to get her confidence easily. Would definitely recommend

I visited for back pain treatment. Doctor prescribed medicines and said to do exercises which were helpful. There was not much waiting time to consult the doctor. I would like to recommend this doctor to others and I would like to give a rating of 7/10.
